entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 18 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Low minus 12 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
